channel.title: Local Obituaries from WREX.com and Tributes.com
channel.description: Obituaries and Online Obituaries News at Tributes.com. Find Local and National Obituaries News and Personal Tributes. Read Obituaries, Death and Funeral Notices, and Create Obituaries for Loved Ones.

item.title: Charles R. Burton, 80, Sterling, Illinois
item.description: Charles R. "Charlie" Burton, 80 of Emerson, died Monday March 11, 2013 at his home. He was born on February 4, 1933 in Kentucky, the son of Homer and Alice (Dresvick) Burton. He was a veteran of the Korean War having served proudly in the Marines. Charlie was employed at the former Northwestern Steel and Wire Co in Sterling for 35 years before retiring. He then worked for the past 11 years as a greeter at the Rock Falls Walmart Store. He married Aldiana (Reyes) Ramos on February 14, 1987....
item.author: Tributes.com

item.title: Ronald H. Bushman, 60, Rock Falls, Illinois
item.description: ROCK FALLS – Ronald H. Bushman, 60 of Rock Falls died Sunday March 10, 2013 at his home. He was born on September 21, 1952 in Sterling, the son of Donald Francis and Doris Illene (Welch) Bushman and was a 1970 graduate of Rock Falls High School. He married Debbie Diane Patterson. She died May 25, 1982. He was employed at Pete Harkness Dodge in Sterling as parts manager and prior to that he worked for Jerry Warren Buick in Sterling for a total of 17 years. He enjoyed meeting friends at the...
item.author: Tributes.com

item.title: Elda L. "Dolly" Bohms, 89, Rock Falls, Illinois
item.description: Elda L. "Dolly" Bohms, 89, of Rock Falls died Saturday, March 9, 2013 at Coventry Living Center, Sterling. Born December 3, 1923 in Emmerson, she was a daughter of Henry and Anna (Ricklefs) Dravis. On June 30, 1948 she was united in marriage to Lester Bohms in Rock Falls. Dolly worked in the office and as a sales associate at Wheelock Furniture in Rock Falls for 15 years until her retirement in 1974. She was a member of Good Shepherd Lutheran Church in Rock Falls where she enjoyed...
item.author: Tributes.com

item.title: Guadalupe O. Munoz, 74, Sterling, Illinois
item.description: Guadalupe O. Munoz, 74, of Sterling, died Thursday, March 7, 2013 at Genesis East Medical Center, Davenport. Born October 27, 1938 in McAllen, Texas she was the daughter of Sixto and Magdalena (Garza) Ortega. On August 5, 1958 she was united in marriage to Yrineo Munoz in Princeton. She worked for General Electric in Morrison, IL for 30 years before retiring. She was a member of St. Mary Catholic Church in Sterling. Guadalupe was an avid bowler and enjoyed shopping, cooking, baking and...
item.author: Tributes.com

item.title: Joyce M. Preston, 72, Sterling, Illinois
item.description: Joyce M. Preston, age 72, of Sterling died Thursday, March 07, 2013 at Swedish American Hospital in Rockford. Joyce was born July 11, 1940 in Sterling, the daughter of Arthur J. and Myrtle (Modler) Fossett. She married James Preston on June 24, 1962 in Rock Falls. Joyce worked as an activities aid at Coventry Living Center for 12 years she also ran a day care from her home for many years. She was a member of Sacred Heart Catholic Church in Sterling. Survivors include her husband, James R....
item.author: Tributes.com

item.title: Verdayne Schrader, 89, Janesville, Wisconsin
item.description: JANESVILLE--- Verdayne Schrader, age 89, of Janesville, died on Tuesday, March 12, 2013, at home surrounded by his loving family who cared for him during his recent illness. He was born in Houston, MN on Dec. 25, 1923, the son of Bert and Emma (Strand) Schrader. He graduated from Merrill High School in Merrill, WI. Verdayne served his country during WWII in the European Theatre, receiving a bronze star, combat infantry badge, and the WWII Victory medal. He married Orella Kaufman on May 24, 1952...
item.author: Tributes.com

item.title: Magda "Matzi" Johnson, 91, Huntley, Illinois
item.description: Magda "Matzi" Johnson, age 91, of Huntley, Illinois, passed away on March 11, 2013. She was the loving wife of Verne; caring mother of Don (Rosary) and Marianne (Keith); cherished Oma of Jacqueline, Joseph, Hannah and Hailee. Magda was born in Germany, the oldest of five children. In 1957 she moved to the USA and settled in North Riverside, Illinois. Magda married Verne in 1960 and they were married for 52 years. Magda was a gifted artist, pianist, seamstress and loved to work in her...

item.title: Clifford Bowling, 80, Cherry Valley, Illinois
item.description: Clifford Bowling, 80, of Cherry Valley passed away Saturday, March 9, 2013, in OSF St. Anthony Medical Center. Clifford was born November 5, 1932, in Van Lear, KY, son of Clayton and Gracie (Boyd) Bowling. Clifford and Mary Good were married January 27, 1951 in Dora, IN. Clifford worked the coal mines in Legion, KY, before moving to Wabash, IN, in 1949. There he worked for General Electric until the plant was closed. He worked for General Tire for a short time before moving to Rockford where...

item.title: Juanita Hunt, 93, Janesville, Wisconsin
item.description: JANESVILLE ---Juanita "Jan" Hunt, age 93, of Janesville and formerly of Chicago, passed into the loving arms of God on Friday, March 8, 2013, at home, surrounded by family and friends. She was born in Morgantown, IN on May 17, 1919, the daughter of John Jacob and Susie Eugenia (Stover) Crunk. She graduated from the School of Art Institute of Chicago. Jan married William R. Hunt in St. Chrysostom's Episcopal Church, Chicago on Jan. 17, 1942, and he preceded her in death on Sept. 28, 1994. She...

item.title: Lester St. Clair, 79, Janesville, Wisconsin
item.description: Lester St. Clair, age 79, of Salt Lake City, Utah and formerly of Janesville, died on Thursday, March 7, 2013, at his home. He was born in Janesville, on Oct. 29, 1933, the son of Clifford and Marie (Pollock) St. Clair, Sr. He served in the U.S. Army. Lester married Lois Rowley in Rockton, IL on June 29, 1963, and she preceded him in death on Sept. 13, 2001. Les traveled the world and was known around the world as a breeder of Top Egyptian Arabian Horses. He was a Real Estate Land Developer in...
